titles.title: A resolution congratulating Carrie Underwood for winning the "American Idol" television program and thanking her for being a positive role model.
A resolution congratulating Carrie Underwood for winning the "American Idol" television program and thanking her for being a positive role model.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Congratulates Carrie Underwood of Checotah, Oklahoma, for winning the "American Idol" television program contest.
Thanks her for being a positive public role model and representative of Oklahoma.
